thread.title: Victoria steps out in turtleneck in New York
thread.title_full: Victoria Beckham steps out in turtleneck in New York | Daily Mail Online

author: Lisa Mcloughlin For Mailonline
title: Victoria steps out in turtleneck in New York
text:
She's been in New York soaking up the style for fashion week amid her husband's email hacking scandal.
And while the show must go on, Victoria Beckham continued to keep her head held high as she stepped out in a warmth inducing knit on Saturday in the Big Apple.
The 42-year-old fashion designer arrived at her headquarters, ignoring the plummeting temperatures in the American city simply clad in her moss hued turtle neck jumper.
Scroll down for video
No moss-ing around! Victoria Beckham continued to keep her head held high as she stepped out in a warmth inducing knit on Saturday in the Big Apple
While snow lay around her, she still stylishly rolled up her sleeves to her elbows as she strolled from her SUV to her office in demure fashion without a weather appropriate coat in sight.
Attempting to warm up, the style maven nestled her chin beneath the ribs of her polo neck, which hid her lithe frame.
The mother-of-four teamed her look with a pair of black palazzo pants, that highlighted her narrow waist as she swapped her usual heels for white trainers.
Keeping her accessories to a minimum, Victoria flashed her gold statement watch on her wrist, while carrying her tan clutch under arm.
Chic: The 42-year-old fashion designer arrived at her headquarters, ignoring the plummeting temperatures in the American city simply clad in her moss hued turtle neck jumper
The fashion darling hid her facial features as she sported a pair of trademark oversized shades, while her chestnut chin-length locks fell around her face in a loose curl.
Victoria has been across the pond working on her latest collection for New York Fashion Week.
With her runway presentation scheduled for Sunday it's no doubt been a busy time for the star, who has come under fire from fans for pushing her brand amid her husband's email scandal.
As she tried to focus on her own business by sharing products from her Spring/Summer collection on Monday, the backlash turned on her - with critics slamming her for her husband's emails and for using slim models.
Chilled: While snow lay around her, she still stylishly rolled up her sleeves to her elbows as she strolled from her SUV to her office in demure fashion without a weather appropriate coat in sight
Strut your stuff in wide leg trousers like Victoria Beckham Victoria, Victoria Beckham Pre-Autumn/ Winter 2017
Available from May!
Buy now
Victoria Beckham was spotted out and about in New York ahead of her Autumn/ Winter 2017 show there this week wearing a pair of black slouch wide leg trousers teamed with a khaki green turtleneck jumper.
We're loving these relaxed fit trews which are of course from Victoria's own eponymous collection. The wide legs and high waist are guaranteed to elongate your pins to supermodel proportions; meanwhile the black colour makes them super versatile.
These trousers won't be available until May but you can check out the current collection by following the link on the right or for more choice scroll through our edit of alternatives in the carousel below.
A great workwear wardrobe update, style with a crisp white shirt and flats for a chic office look, or pair with heel, a tee and a clutch for a night out.

After sharing an image of her collection, one angry Quote: : 'Anorexic chic was so yesterday!'
Another user accused the former Spice Girl of arrogance, adding: 'u had a 'small' girl band a 100 yrs ago get over it. u r by no means a rock or any legend. move on honey. arrogant (sic).'
Then came the criticism over David's emails: 'Sorry your husband has lost the plot he said what he said he need to get over it. (sic)'
Under fire: Victoria's husband David is back home in London after being caught up in an email scandal
One quipped: 'Tell David its about time people can now see what he is really like. He stopped becoming a footballer when he met you.'
In the leak, David reacted angrily when he found out he had been passed over for a knighthood.
The former England captain branded the Honours Committee ‘unappreciative c***s’ and dismissed lower awards, ranting: ‘Unless it’s a knighthood f*** off’.
Leak: In the leak, David reacted angrily when he had been passed over for a knighthood
According to the revelations, the Honours Committee had already agreed that Beckham's nomination – almost certainly proposed by his PR advisers – was well 'merited' before a routine check of his tax affairs.
The leaked emails also include a number of bombshells and series of sweary-rants and may even have been used as part of a £1million blackmail plot.
In one message the ex-England captain allegedly claims singer Katherine Jenkins, 36, got an OBE for ‘singing at the rugby and going to see the troops plus taking coke. F
